column2: Marinated in a spicy jerk seasoning, these chicken wings are grilled to perfection and served with a side of tangy mango salsa.
Crispy fritters filled with tender conch meat, onions, bell peppers, and spices. Served with a remoulade sauce for dipping.
Flaky pastry pockets filled with spiced beef or chicken, onions, and bell peppers. A popular street food in Jamaica, these patties are perfect as an appetizer or snack.
Crispy fritters filled with saut√©ed callaloo (a type of leafy green), onions, garlic, and spices. Served with a side of jerk mayo for dipping.
Crispy cakes made with ackee fruit, salted cod fish, onions, bell peppers, and spices. A popular appetizer in Jamaica, these cakes are often served with a side of tangy tartar sauce.
